  • Method Details

    • convertToGray

      public static BufferedImage convertToGray(BufferedImage inputImage)
      This method converts a given color BufferedImage to grayscale.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input color BufferedImage to convert to grayscale.
      Returns:
      A grayscale BufferedImage representing the input image.

    • increaseBrightness

      public static BufferedImage increaseBrightness(BufferedImage inputImage, int increase)
      This method increases the brightness of a given BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage.
      increase - The percentage increase in brightness (0 to 100).
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with increased brightness.

    • decreaseBrightness

      public static BufferedImage decreaseBrightness(BufferedImage inputImage, int decrease)
      This method decreases the brightness of a given BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage.
      decrease - The percentage decrease in brightness (0 to 100).
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with decreased brightness.

    • mirrorHorizontally

      public static BufferedImage mirrorHorizontally(BufferedImage inputImage)
      This method horizontally mirrors a given BufferedImage.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage to be mirrored horizontally.
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with horizontal mirroring applied.

    • mirrorVertically

      public static BufferedImage mirrorVertically(BufferedImage inputImage)
      Mirrors a given BufferedImage vertically. This method creates a new BufferedImage with the same type as the input image, then copies the pixel colors from the input image to the output image with a vertical flip.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage to be vertically mirrored.
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with vertical mirroring applied.

    • rotate

      public static BufferedImage rotate(BufferedImage inputImage, int degrees)
      This method rotates a given BufferedImage by a specified angle in degrees.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage to be rotated.
      degrees - The angle in degrees by which to rotate the image.
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with the specified rotation applied.

    • blur

      public static BufferedImage blur(BufferedImage inputImage, int radius)
      This method applies a blur effect to a given BufferedImage with a specified radius.
      Parameters:
      inputImage - The input BufferedImage to be blurred.
      radius - The radius of the blur effect (determines the blurriness level).
      Returns:
      A new BufferedImage with the blur effect applied.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      This is the main method for image manipulation. It allows the user to load an image, choose an operation, and save the result.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments provided by the user (not directly used for this application).
